text: Cirilo B. Flores (June 20, 1948 - September 6, 2014) was an American prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. Flores was born in Corona, California. Flores served as coadjutor bishop of San Diego from 2012 to 2013 and as auxiliary bishop of the Diocese of Orange from 2009 to 2012. He served as the bishop of the Diocese of San Diego in California. He held the position from September 18, 2013 until his death on September 6, 2014. Flores died in San Diego from prostate cancer, aged 66. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Lawyers from San Diego Category:American Roman Catholic bishops Category:Cancer deaths in San Diego County Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:People from Corona, California Category:Stanford University alumni
title: Cirilo Flores
